attributes.action: stop buses and taxis speeding in the designated permit holders only lanes country wide
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: whilst the idea of a priority lane for permit holders is great , i find myself troubled by the mis use of these lanes by the permit holders themselves. undertaking at excessive speeds, overtaking cyclists and in doing so crossing the boundary solid white lines, barging in at the end of these lanes. we call for the use of speed devices and deterant cameras to be used to reduce their calvalier attitudes and restore some safety around these " speeding" lanes
